contest-event.event-date:
March 27, 1976 D SWBBA Spring Brass Band Festival (Second Section)
SWBBA Spring Brass Band Festival (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest South West BBA Spring Brass Band Festival swbba-spring-brass-band-festival-second-section
Queen's Theatre, Barnstaple, Devon, England, UK Test piece awards: 1st: Harris Cup 2nd: Ronald Whiteways Cup 3rd: Brookholding Dawes Trophy
Own choice march contest also held: 1st: Lostwithiel Silver (182pts) 2nd: Bideford Town (180pts)
April 9, 2012, 6:58 p.m. April 9, 2012, 7:02 p.m.
1 Crewkerne Concert Band Mike Shepherd
2 Bideford Town Band M. W. Sweet
3 Lostwithiel Silver J. Bunt
Withdrawn Launceston Town Band B. Luxton
